column1: Little Goat Diner////The Grilled Cheese was good
column2: but I've had better. It was super flavorful but was missing the cheese overload I was looking for (I really like cheese
column3: hence the cheese fries earlier). If you're meh on cheese
column4: this might be the right one for you. My husband ordered the Okonomiyaki and liked it
column5: but I'm not sure that is what he actually ate. The man next to me ordered the same thing and it looked similar to my husbands meal but not the same ( I wasn't able to give a full inspection as I'd have liked as the man seemed apprehensive about me staring at his food).  His had meat on it. My husband's had no meat but had an egg on it.  Not sure which one was correct
